title: The Plague [a discussion]
creator_credit: Barry Washington, Richard McRoberts and Country Education Project
brief_description: A program which provides an analysis of the novel “The Plague” by Albert Camus, some comments on symbolism found in it and some stimulus for further discussion. Discusses the life and philosophy of Camus with reference to the novel; various subject levels of the novel; narrative structure and characters.
